attr.title: To the Moon
attr.desc: A unique & non-combat story-driven experience Â· Innovative mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics. A story-driven experience about two doctors traversing backwards through a dying man's memories to artificially fulfill his last wish.
attr.inst: If using the GOG Version place the to_the_moon_*.sh installer in the root of the to_the_moon folder or extract the contents of the data/noarch/game/ folder into to_the_moon/gamedata/
